Method.name: Scan
Method.Implementation:
s sc = 1, i = 1
s pages = page.Pages() Q:pages=0 $$$ERROR($$$GeneralError,"Can't parse pages count ")
while i <= pages {
s sc = page.Parse() Q:'sc w !, "Page of repositories #", i, " successfuly loaded", ! s i = i + 1, sc = page.Get( , i ) ;load next page #i in parser Q:'sc } Q sc

Method.name: OnRepository
Method.Description: Event handler <var>data</var> - key-value array with repository properties If handler return 0, parsing will be interrupted
Method.Implementation:
Q:'##class(GitHub.Organization).NameExists( ..Organization, .organizationId ) 0 s data("Organization") = organizationId s data("Link") = "https://github.com/"_..Organization_"/"_$g(data("Name"))
s sc = ##class(GitHub.Repository).Insert( .data )
w $g(data), " " ;output repository id
Q sc
